meta.content: Mount Vernon Township High School - School Closure Extended

meta.title: Mount Vernon Township High School - School Closure Extended

div.em: Current conditions as of 20 Apr 17:56 pm CDT

div.div: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 10pm, then a slight chance of showers between 10pm and midnight. Partly cloudy, with a low around 46. West southwest wind 6 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.
Sunny, with a high near 60. Northwest wind 8 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.
Clear, with a low around 38. West northwest wind around 6 mph becoming calm in the evening.
